   .. attribute:: airmass
      

      Class to Make schedules for the target list, observatory, dtae_range and startegy indicated

      :param target_list:
      :type target_list: list of all target with their basic info
      :param observatory:
      :type observatory: list of the observatory , and observatory/telescope if several telescope per observatory
      :param startegy:
      :type startegy: scheduling strategy, either 'continuous' or 'segmented'
      :param duration_segement:
      :type duration_segement: if strategy segmented chosen need to specify the duration of each segment
      :param nb_segments:
      :type nb_segments: if strategy segmented chosen, number of target per night

      :returns:
      :rtype: night blocks for the night and telescope according to the strategy selected
